name: Sleep Paralysis Simulator
description:
Sleep paralysis is a state, during waking up and falling asleep, in which a person is aware but unable to move or speak. During an episode, one may hallucinate (hear, feel, or see things that are not there). Episodes can last anywhere from a few seconds to a few minutes.

This is a short experience based off of my own sleep paralysis episode a few years back. Some aspects were obviously tweaked for a more interesting and entertaining gameplay experience. I hope you enjoy :)
